titles.title: To require the Secretary of Energy to establish and carry out a program to support the availability of HA-LEU for domestic commercial use, and for other purposes.
Advanced Nuclear Fuel Availability Act
Advanced Nuclear Fuel Availability Act
Advanced Nuclear Fuel Availability Act
Advanced Nuclear Fuel Availability Act
Advanced Nuclear Fuel Availability Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Mr. Rush moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 1760.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary:
Advanced Nuclear Fuel Availability Act
This bill directs the Office of Nuclear Energy in the Department of Energy to develop and deploy high-assay low-enriched uranium for domestic commercial use and to develop a schedule for recovering costs associated with such development.
